text: Steve Carver (April 5, 1945 â€“ January 8, 2021) was an American movie director, producer, and photographer. He was born in New York City. His career began in 1970 and he retired in 1996. His best known works were Lone Wolf McQuade, Big Bad Mama and Capone. Carver died in Los Angeles from a heart attack on January 8, 2021, at age 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American photographers Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles
title: Steve Carver
